trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o objeto que suporte o padrão de controlo especificado do elemento que está associado este ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> object: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be sorted.
trans-unit.target: Se um dos seguintes casos ocorrer, este método devolve atual <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>objeto:- `patternInterface` é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>objeto que está associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>podem ser ordenados.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>objeto que está associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>podem ser redimensionados pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração que especifica o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Atual objeto se patternInterface é um valor suportado; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte observações.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado este ponto de automatização contém dados que são apresentados ao utilizador.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: Envia um pedido para ativar um controlo e iniciar a ação única, inequívoca.

trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.
